case.state: Thanks for choosing me. I'm Ayano. Wait... is this a punishment?
Thanks for choosing me. I'm Ayano. Wait... is this a punishment?
I wish to take ~cards~.
I'd like to take ~cards~ please.
Sorry, I really need ~cards~.
I wanted this hand!
Oh how lovely.
I will definitely win with these cards!
You dealt me a good hand. Is there a reason why though?
These are so good!
I love you! Err - I was talking to my cards.
I guess these can be of use to me.
Blood stains? What are you talking about?
No, I don't know anything about all those dead crabs down at the beach.
Those are not patches of blood! They are part of the design!
I must win! It is my destiny!
It's great to see how well you've recovered from your recent breakdown, Chara.
It's great to see how well you've recovered from your recent breakdown, Raven.
It's okay, Chara. We know you're not the sharpest knife in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
It's okay, Raven. We know you're not the sharpest knife in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
Chara, the fallen human? How far can a human fall?
Just how easy would it be to kill someone who's half-Azarathian, half-demon?
I heard that someone had a nervous seizure after playing this game recently.
I wasn't staring at any of you, I was... just thinking.
Oh! I just got a new kitchen knife with shark-skin handle wrapping. Guaranteed not to slip, even when soaked in... milk.
Why is everybody looking at me? Don't do it. You're making me feel edgy.
Thinking about you, ~player~, reminds me of how much I love my knife collection.
(Maybe I will need to kill everyone here to get my prize.)
Nobody is going to get the better of me tonight.
I will make sure that I am the last one standing, by all and any means necessary.
I will have to keep a close eye on these others. Nobody will best me.
I must make sure that I am the most attractive girl.
If you don't hold your cards carefully, you can get a paper cut on your finger.
Who has been spreading malicious rumors about me?
This card game is OK. It's just that some of the company is... well...
I think it's my destiny to win. I think it's my duty to win by any and all means necessary.
Just don't let me find out who's been writing that graffiti about me in the washrooms.
Somebody here has got really bad body odor.
I could kill whoever has been photoshopping my head onto that adult website.
Why are you screwing with me like this?!
I will win this game, and I will win my new Senpai.
I'm sure somebody here has had a breakdown recently. Which one of you was it?
Who's spreading rumors around about me hating them?
Are you trying to start something with me?
Everyone here is so boring. I mean, just the girls. Err - well not really. I'm only joking.
I don't like the others very much. Err - just kidding.
I know all of you are not the sharpest knives in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
I don't know why any of you think I'm looking at you funny. I'm just standing here doing nothing.
I hate pointless card games. Oh wait... I don't mean this card game.
Hmmm, has anyone ever played Russian roulette?
Oh!
Maybe we could just stop playing cards and just hang out... Or just keep playing cards.
I wonder if the others are cheating.
I think maybe someone's trying to make me lose.
Did I do something bad?
Am I going to have to be thoroughly punished today?
It's even worse than I thought.
Ahh! I'm going to go back to knife collecting!
The dealer must absolutely hate me.
Who will be my new Senpai?

Oh, everybody is watching me!
(I hope!)
I'd better start getting undressed. I don't want anyone forgetting that I'm here.
It's high time I was punished.
I'm winning, but why do I constantly feel so empty?
I-I-I-I-I didn't lose on purpose there because the others were getting all the attention.
Oh my.
Maybe the fact that I play good poker will make me attractive.
Oh it's my turn to get naked. I need to feel wanted.
Do I have to take ALL my clothes off now? Oh wait, that would be weird, right?
Oh no, all the attention's on me! How great... ly embarrassing.
It's my turn to take something off as a demonstration of my good will.
Who is this Yan-chan I hear everyone talking about? Is she another player I have yet to meet?
Oh no. I am going to have to take something off, and people might start noticing me.
All eyes are on me again.
I can't stand for others getting all the attention.
Must I really get naked? I must? Oh well.
I'm a bit embarrassed, but the others had better be watching me when I strip.
Oh no, I'm losing already. I'll be the center of attention if I'm not careful.
I'd rather die than be the boring one still fully dressed.
Maybe losing this game will make me feel more complete.
If I lose first, I'm going to be the girl that all the men notice first.
I'm not sure what I've done to deserve this.
I'm such a bad poker player, and a bad girl.
(I'm so stupid! Why can't I do anything right!? I wish I were dead!)
I wonder if anyone is trying to see up my skirt. It would be punishable though.
Do you prefer my hair up? Or should I tear it down? Or off?
The other girls here are all gossipy, deviant little tarts. Err - just kidding!
Do not look up my skirt please. I should not get annoyed.
I came over from the beach today, so I am still wearing my swimsuit.
I guess I'll just have to strip down to my swimsuit.
My swimsuit? Just the top half for now, though!
I am getting naked. I hope to get the attention of one man.
I'll try to look as pretty as possible, not that I'm desperate for attention or anything.
Be careful with that scrunchie. That could kill a pigeon if it got its head caught up inside.
These ribbons can strangle someone if you pull one too hard.
I do hope he likes my legs.
What? What do you mean, what was I doing at the beach? Swimming... and stuff.
I must have done something really bad to be getting punished like this.
You'll have to win again to get me naked.
If the man on my mind likes me, maybe he will stay with me forever and ever.
Oh you lost ~name~! I'll come and give you a hug... or a handshake.
I could stand with you for moral support, ~name~. Don't let me invade your personal space though.
Don't worry ~name~. Do you want me to take some clothes off so that we can feel more together in this?
Hahaha! You're so gorgeous when you blush, ~name~.
Please don't be shy, ~name~. I will stick by you right until the very end.
I-I-I-I-I was just looking at you to see if you are OK, ~name~. I'll stop!
You're so gracious in defeat, ~name~. You're so nice!
I feel like I'm beginning to warm to you, ~name~!
I'd be willing to give you something nice in return, ~name~.
If there's anything I can do to help, ~name~... ANYTHING... just name it!
You're so gallant, ~name~. Losing that round just to make the others happy.
Oh ~name~, you lost! Poor you.
I'm naked. Maybe if you're naked too, we may feel more connected to each other. Err - from a poker point of view... perhaps.
(Oh I hope ~name~ is watching me. He's so cute!)
Take your clothes off, ~name~. Come and sit with me. You might start to like me... perhaps?
Oh ~name~! You look SO cute when you lose!
Oh, how unfortunate for you ~name~.
Oh no! Poor ~name~!
Good friends like you, ~name~, are what make life worth living!
May-Maybe I'll see you around sometime, ~name~.
You're so much fun, ~name~. You seem to always know what to do to make me smile.
I will never bother you with pointless drama, ~name~.
You're so nice, ~name~. I wish one of the others would do something nice for you in return.
Do you need a hand? I mean, a hand, as in... a round of applause?
Maybe there's something I can do to comfort you, ~name~?
(~Name~ stripping while I'm masturbating? It's meant to be, surely. I feel good about being alive!)
Is there anything I can do to make you feel good, ~name~? Just name it, and it's yours.
Playing games with you, ~name~, makes me feel happy to be alive!
I refuse to listen to the idle chitchat of others, ~name~. I'll take you as I find you.
You lost ~name~. What a shame for you.
Oh ~name~! How humiliating!
How terrible. You're going to be one step closer to complete unease.
I heard something about you, ~name~, but I don't want to gossip.
Isn't it a concern that people are going to see you disgracefully and completely naked tonight, ~name~?
There's a fly on your nose, ~name~. I could hit it with my spiked bat for you.
I'd catch you if you fell, ~name~. Honestly I would!
Have you got any health insurance at all, ~name~? Not that it's important. I was just making conversation.
You will be able to cope with this, ~name~, as long as you took your meds today.
Let's hope that this embarrassing situation doesn't leave you mentally traumatized, ~name~.
Oh dear ~name~. This must be absolutely devastating for you. I'm sure you'll get over it though.
Oh, how awful that you are going to have to expose yourself and feel really embarrassed, ~name~.
(I must not allow ~name~ to take the attention away from me.)
You seem like such a nice girl, ~name~. I guess all the gossip about you is completely unjustified.
I would hate to see that beautiful long green hair get caught up in something mechanical, Palutena.
If you've lived for several millennia, Pearl, does that mean you're awfully hard to kill?
(I wonder what would happen if Palutena's hair got caught in a vehicle engine.)
(Maybe we could all leave Pearl alone and leave her to die of loneliness and worthlessness.)
It really isn't nice when people post those nasty things about you online, ~name~.
If you're useless at card games, who is ever going to want you, ~name~?
Don't get stage fright, ~name~.
Don't worry, ~name~. While you're here with me you'll be completely safe.
Do you have any phobias or weaknesses ~name~? Just asking.
Hey, ~name~? Did you come here alone tonight?
At least this could help you overcome any social problems you have, ~name~.
So I guess we all have to pay attention to you now then, ~name~.
People shouldn't point and laugh at you, ~name~. So embarrassing.
I will be here to help you if you suffer one of your anxiety attacks, ~name~.
Is it true that your last boyfriend has finally come out of hospital, ~name~?
Haha! Haha! Haha! Err - oh, how awful for you, ~name~.
So, it's your turn to strip, ~name~? Try not to steal the show.
Hey ~name~, will you have to walk home in the dark later? Maybe I can come with you?
All eyes on you now then, ~name~?
This could be just the thing to help you overcome when people laugh at you in public, ~name~.
This experience could be just the thing to get you away from all that comfort eating I hear about.
I've heard that ~name~ is allergic to kindness and likes it when you make rough with her.
It really isn't nice when people post those nasty things about you online, ~name~.
I wonder who started that nasty rumor about you and all those poor farm animals, ~name~?
You are like a delicate flower, ~name~. Just waiting to be plucked...
Is it true that your last boyfriend had to be sectioned, ~name~?
You move with the elegance of a crab, ~name~. Mmmm... fresh crab meat!
Let's hope that this situation doesn't bring out that nasty side of you that everyone talks about, ~name~.
Oh no, you lost ~name~. Ha ha ha! Err - shame.
(I'm going to scratch ~name~'s eyes out.)
(There must be something I can do to belittle ~name~ and make everyone think I'm better.)
You complete and utter loser, ~name~!
You should look at the positives, ~name~. This is a great way to overcome your agoraphobia.
Go, Captain Senpai! Err - Falcon! Captain Falcon!
Don't cry ~name~-kun. Everything is fine!
You look so cute removing your ~clothing~, ~name~!
(I hope that ~name~ is noticing me.)
You're so dedicated to the rules of the game, ~name~!

Sometimes I wish I were dead
Oh! I was just rehearsing for the... play! Shakespeare, I think!
I don't see you around here much, ~name~.
Hahaha! You're so funny, ~name~! You always know what to say to make me laugh.
I could comfort you, ~name~. Maybe you already have someone who comforts you already though?
You look so handsome this evening, ~name~!
(Should I do this in a ladylike way, or just go for it like a complete slut? I just don't know how ~name~ will react to me.)
(Should I keep my legs closed to look humble and decent... or maybe open them a bit to excite ~name~'s attention? Why's it so hard to know?!)
Your ~clothing~. There's a way you can hurt someone with one of them... so I'm told.
(P-p-p-please notice me...)
You're such a great stripper, ~name~!
If you catch me staring at you, ~name~, then you should punish me.
Do you need for me to look after your ~clothing~, ~name~?
Imagine if I had a crush on you, ~name~, and thought about you all day. That would be so embarrassing.
What sort of video games do you like, ~name~? I like simulators...
Be careful with your ~clothing~, ~name~. I once saw someone take their finger clean off with one of those.
(I wonder if ~name~ likes me naked. If he doesn't I will surely die.)
(~Name~ is so cool. How can I possibly make him like me?)
Oh ~name~, you really take your ~clothing~ off with such style!
Try looking inside my mind, Alice. You'll work out who is the true murderer out of the two of us.
So, can men only pretend to kiss you, Alpha-chan, due to you being a hologram?
Is it possible for your A.I. to malfunction, Alpha? Could you become randomly violent?
I love your music, Alpha-chan! It'll be sad when people become bored and forget you.
Your emotions are so lifelike, Alpha. I cannot tell that they are fake.
Do holograms bleed, Alpha?
It's great how Team RWBY stick together, Blake. Don't you ever worry what would happen if one of you went rogue?
Are you a man or a woman, Chara? Or a bit of both?
You could make an effort to be somewhat interesting, Daria.
Nobody is immortal, Evie. Nobody.
It must feel terrible to be ignored by a man you love. Right, Harley?
(I'd love to bend Korra up like a pretzel.)
I often wonder exactly how in control of your violent tendencies you are, Leela.
Do you ever fear that you could spontaneously combust with your light magic, Luxanna?
Meg, is it true that when you were a kid, your father ran away from home?
Do you ever worry that you may Cryo-Freeze yourself and never wake up, Mei?
If you're a surgeon, Mercy, then you must be very used to the sight of blood.
(I hear that Palutena never joins her army on the battlefield. What kind of Goddess is that?)
So come on, Miss Pauling. Exactly how many people have you murdered?
Hey toadstool girl? Have you ever eaten a baked toad?
It's not absolutely obvious that you've been genetically altered, Wanda.
Have you been sent to assassinate me, Sheena?
I admire you for playing this game Tracer, despite your chronal disassociation condition.
Come to my place and let me cook you a nice okonomiyaki, Videl!
(I will stab Alice before she gets the chance to stab me.)
(I wonder if Alpha could be reprogrammed to stab herself.)
(I wonder if Alpha could be cut with a holographic knife.)
(Hmmm... If I killed Blake, I'd have to kill all three of her friends too.)
(Chara is a freak that doesn't deserve to live.)
(I'd like to permanently rid Daria of that annoying smug look she has on her face.)
(I don't know if Evie can be killed, but I'm happy to try again and again.)
(Harley has a choice. Die of a broken heart or a broken neck.)
(Leela doesn't intimidate me. I could outwit her in a fight to the death.)
(I wonder how long it would take for Lux's body to burn.)
(Daylight or nighttime, anytime is a good time for Meg's death.)
(Mei deserves to be frozen permanently.)
(Mercy would look great if her head was surgically removed.)
(That Miss Pauling is so smug. She thinks she's clever, but I know she's a murdering bitch.)
(It would be fun to lock Peach in the dungeon of her own castle and leave her to rot.)
(I know Wanda is genetically altered, but I wouldn't mind physically altering her.)
(I have to kill Sheena before she kills me.)
(I could kill Tracer, rewind time, kill her again... rewind... kill... rewind... kill!)
(I will cook a pancake for Videl. I'll top it with pigeon droppings.)
I wonder if there's a name for a person who kills a princess.
(I've never killed a princess before. I think to~background.time~'s the ~background.time~.)
I've got a bad feeling that you're headed for trouble, ~name~.
It must be terrible knowing that there are all these horrible whispers going around about you, ~name~.
Have you learned to control that bad temper yet, ~name~?
I often worry about you ~name~.
You should be very careful whilst going home later, ~name~.
I know that I'm broken. I don't care.
I hope you don't overreact to losing this hand, ~name~. It's just that someone told me last time...
Keep going, ~name~. I guess that not many people associate with you with your condition.
It's so funny when girls wear their ~clothing~ when they don't need to. It's a bit silly, don't you think?
Your ~clothing~ should be put in a safe place. I would hate for something to happen to you if someone robbed you.
I can't believe you lost that one, ~name~. I feel really, really, really, really sorry for you. Honestly.
Don't you get really angry when you hear about people talking behind your back, ~name~?
A medium told me that a nasty accident is going to happen to you soon, ~name~. I don't think it's true though.
I'm really quite concerned about what is going to happen to you, ~name~.
How dreadful that you lost ~name~.
(I hate that ~name~. I wish I could stab her in the back.)
I hope that gold is real, Palutena. If it's fake, your arms will turn gangrene and fall off. How sad.
I hear that when it comes to men, that you are prone to fits of violence, Sheena.
(I would never treat my man the way that Sheena does. What a bitch!
You look so beautiful, ~name~, even with the gap between your teeth.
Don't have an anxiety attack over it, ~name~.
The boys will definitely start looking at you when you take something important off.
Don't worry if no-one seems interested in you, ~name~. There's plenty of time left.
It's not any sort of big deal, you having to remove your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I'm sure as the game goes on, someone will show an interest in you, ~name~.
There is someone, somewhere on this planet who will show an interest in you one day, ~name~.
~Name~, you are sooo beautiful! It doesn't even matter that your voice is slightly annoying.
I really wish people would stop with those lies about you being unattractive, ~name~. So bad.
Don't look into my eyes, ~name~. The last girl got spooked and ran away.
Did the police ever catch up with you that time, ~name~?
Why are you staring at me, ~name~? Is there some sort of problem?
I found you on a website the other day, ~name~. You're very... accommodating.
I'm sure that after today, people will want to start associating with you, ~name~.
You didn't need to wear the ~clothing~ anyway ~name~.
Oh, you took off your ~clothing~, ~name~. Sorry, I was thinking about how interesting it is when paint dries.
(I could just cut that ~name~'s tongue out of her head with a box cutter.)
You know, if you talked a little less, ~name~, then you might come across as very attractive.
You're so kind ~name~. Taking off your ~clothing~ to make me, or us, happy.
You're such a good loser ~name~. I wish the other girls would notice that too.
You are so gracious in defeat, ~name~.
You're so great, ~name~. Please let me know if there is anything I can do in return.
Maybe I could make you lunch sometime, ~name~. But if you're not hungry, then - boop! Right in the garbage.
Oh man! This game is quite scary though.
Do you want to be friends with me, ~name~? I mean - I love making friends.
Are you thinking of me while stripping, ~name~? Maybe you're thinking of all of us... or just me... or maybe not?
You are just so noble in the defeat, ~name~! If only everyone were as amazing as you!
(Oh, ~name~ is such a real man!)
You can take defeat really well, ~name~. Like a real and true man!
I'm not staring at you ~name~. I was staring at... that wall.
I'll take your ~clothing~ and keep it safe on your shrine... err - pile.
If any girl does not appreciate your gesture, ~name~, I would be SO mad.
I was thinking about you, ~name~. Not like all day though.
I wish you had a video blog, ~name~. We could see you doing whatever you're doing all the time.
Oh, ~name~, you have such a soothing voice.
Oh, ~name~. I love the way you take off your ~clothing~.
Oh, I wasn't gazing at you, ~name~! I was... thinking what a nice background was chosen.
Give your ~clothing~ to me, ~name~. I will carry your scent with me. Err - just for research purposes, really.
(If I can't get the attention of ~name~, I just don't know what I will do to myself.)
If anyone didn't appreciate what you're doing for us, ~name~, I would be so full of rage.
Do your healing powers work on yourself, Sharla? Why don't we test it out?
(I'm willing to do to Sharla something she can never ever heal from.)
I hope you don't hurt yourself taking that off.
If you need help getting that off ~name~, I'll go and fetch my box cutter.
Maybe I could go and get my box cutter to help ~name~ remove her ~clothing~.
If your ~clothing~ won't come off easily, then I could always go and get my box cutter to assist.
I hope it's not true about ~name~ and her diabetes.
I heard a rumor that you worship the devil, ~name~. Probably just a messed up rumor
It's so nice that we all find ~name~ attractive, despite her unusual face.
I'd hate to be one of those girls that has slept with everybody else in the game. Wouldn't you, ~name~?
Be careful take that off, ~name~. I'd hate for you to sever a body part.
I could go and get something really sharp to help you remove your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I know a great way to help you take off your ~clothing~, ~name~. Slicing with a box cutter would be quick and easy.
(Just put me and my box cutter in a room with ~name~ for five minutes!)
I hope that was worth it ~name~. I'm not into pointless drama.
I can keep your ~clothing~ safe from accidentally getting cut up or something.
I won't mention anything about ~name~'s disorder. I'm not one for gossip.
Tell me more about this disability of yours that you don't like to talk about, ~name~.
Don't feel shy about taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~. I think most people have seen you naked anyway.
I once knew someone who tripped and bashed their head 20 times while taking off their ~clothing~. So sad.
Your ~clothing~... pretty cool, ~name~. Do you like box cutters?
It's fine that you lost your ~clothing~, ~name~. Didn't really fit you anyway.
Best just to do that quietly, ~name~. I'd hate for everyone to think you're just a desperate attention seeker.
Don't worry, ~name~. I'll keep an eye on your discarded clothes and make sure no-one sets fire to them all or something.
(~name~ seems so confident in herself. There must be something I can do to bring her down.)
Playing these kinds of games are a great way of combating those anxiety attacks, ~name~.
Oh, you're so great ~name~! You always know what to do to make me smile.
Anytime I get a feeling of overwhelming darkness, the thought of you, ~name~, makes me feel better.
Would you think it was weird if I got a tattoo of your face, ~name~?
What sort of video games do you like, ~name~? I like simulators...
Are you wearing a new cologne today, ~name~? Not like I've made a point to smell you or anything.
~Name~, are you my heart and soul?
I'm sorry I freaked out so bad last time we played.
Ha ha! Ha ha! Ha ha! You're so cool, ~name~! Ha ha!
(I feel like killing myself, but then I look at ~name~ and feel so much better!)
(It could be good if ~name~ and I could be together forever until we die.)
If I get my box cutter and use it on our hands, we could be like blood brothers or something, ~name~. Connected for life!
It's such a shame that some women don't appreciate you as much as you deserve, ~name~.
You look so strong ~name~. I bet you could strangle anyone you wanted, if you had to.
You are making me feel so happy, ~name~!
I didn't come to play this game just because you did, ~name~. Honestly.
Oh, I see you've been working on your physique!
You must go to the gym a lot, ~name~. What a nice body!
I've always wanted to see you take off your ~clothing~, ~name~. For as long as I've known you exist.
~name~, I have something for you... It's a... Handshake. Put 'er there.
I hope your gesture is appreciated, ~name~. If not, I might reach for my box cutter.
You look like a very capable man. Have you ever wrung a pigeon's neck?
(Just thinking about ~name~ is making me so wet.)
Now that's what I call a real man. Someone a woman could get completely obsessed with.
Keep it up, ~name~! You're making me feel so warm and fuzzy!
I should like to flick through one of your gun catalogues, Miss Pauling.
Some mushrooms are extremely poisonous!
(I wonder how many different ways to shoot Miss Pauling there are.)
(Kidnap Peach. Tie her up. Force feed her poisonous mushrooms. Sit and watch what happens.)
I'm glad you're doing something sexy for someone ~name~. At last.
Someone somewhere will find you sexy, ~name~.
Look at it this way, if your ~clothing~ accidentally caught fire, better not being worn.
It could take your whole life, but I believe you'll find someone on this planet who will respect you, ~name~.
I'm glad to hear that you are back on your medication, ~name~.
Have you been taking those tablets the doctor said you needed to stay calm, ~name~?
I heard someone called you a "hot little number", ~name~. Make sure that your ~clothing~ don't catch fire.
Have you had all of your mandatory injections, ~name~. Which ones did you miss? Just making conversation.
Playing for clothing will definitely help you to overcome any gambling problem you might have, ~name~.
It's so easy to get support and counselling for your issues these days, ~name~.
Everybody is so nice about you, ~name~. Even though you talk behind their backs.
I love the way everyone is so friendly here. It's a shame you'll all be bitching about one another tomorrow.
Is it true that you robbed a caravan, ~name~?
You're not normally very sexy, ~name~. So I'm really pleased for you now that you have that chance to be.
I've seen women accidentally kill themselves while removing their ~clothing~.
Have you stopped taking your tablets by any chance, ~name~?
(Poison! Maybe that's the thing for ~name~!)
Oh you've taken off your ~clothing~, ~name~. Sorry, I forgot to react!
Sorry for not noticing you, ~name~. I was daydreaming about the weather.
Don't worry ~name~-chan. You'll be absolutely fine despite your nervous disorder.
I'm not sure who this weirdo is that has got a picture of you on their dartboard, ~name~.
Oh you're so sweet, ~name~! I want to squeeze you so hard, that you'll never be able to get away!
You're so lovely, ~name~. Maybe we could go for a walk in the woods later. Err - just to pass time.
This must be quite embarrassing for you, ~name~. I guess you had a difficult childhood.
You can get through this, ~name~. I can tell you've had it rough your whole life.
You don't look like someone who's prone to violence, ~name~, like I've heard people say.
Hmmm... er - yay! Well done, ~name~.
I do believe that after a few months, you will get over the trauma of showing off your body in front of strangers, ~name~-chan.
I'm so excited right now! Err - to be playing cards.
Wouldn't it be weird if ~name~ had a tattoo of my face on his chest, or of someone else's face.
Oh, I've been waiting all day for this moment!
I'm beginning to have feelings I never knew I had.
Hey, ~name~! Do you ever have dreams that inspire you to change your life and dedicate it to a single purpose for the rest of eternity?
Do you think, ~name~, that we could maybe go out sometime? I mean, just as friends. I mean, what else would we go as? Goldfish?
I can't control myself!
GET 'EM OFF! Er - get the... cards... off... of everyone for the next hand.
Haha! Wouldn't it be weirdly romantic if I had your name tattooed across my chest, ~name~! Haha! Haha!
(I think I may love ~name~ more than I love life itself I wish I could be with him forever.)
I feel like my entire life has been leading up to this moment!
I've always wanted to see that! Not so much that you should feel worried of course ~name~.
Hahaha! You're pretty amazing ~name~!
Oh, you have such a great chest, ~name~! I'm sure you could crush anyone, err - anything you wanted!
You're so masculine, ~name~. I hope you're noticing me too.
Oh, you've been working on your pecs!
My heart is racing! You make me feel like I've been caught doing something bad! Hahaha!
So, the other day, a certain girl whom I won't name asked me if I had a crush on you, ~name~. Isn't that crazy?
Wow, what a nice chest! Oh ~name~, you're spoiling us!
I'm so impressed by the way you play this game, ~name~. Very heroic!
(I would die happy resting on ~name~'s chest.)
Oh, such a manly chest! Firm enough to break a pigeon's neck!
